{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "incident-teens",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# The SIN tests\n",
    "Here we use MUTIS to analyze the correlations between simple functions, as a method for veryfing the correct functioning of MUTIS."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "id": "willing-withdrawal",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# I'm doing a lot of changes to MUTIS while writting this, better reload automatically.\n",
    "%load_ext autoreload\n",
    "%autoreload 2"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "id": "serious-rugby",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import scipy as sp\n",
    "\n",
    "import matplotlib as mplt\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "\n",
    "import mutis\n",
    "\n",
    "from numpy import pi as pi\n",
    "\n",
    "def vertlines(x0,a,b,s):\n",
    "    for x in (x0+s*np.arange(a,b)):\n",
    "        ax.axvline(x=x, ymin=-1,ymax=+1, color='m', linewidth=3, alpha=0.5)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "crazy-hotel",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## 1. Sinusoidal functions"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "id": "formed-cement",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# Build signal 1\n",
    "t1_o = np.linspace(2,6,40)\n",
    "s1_o = np.sin(t1_o)\n",
    "\n",
    "msk1 = np.random.randn(t1_o.size) > 0.6\n",
    "\n",
    "t1_s = t1_o[msk1]\n",
    "s1_s = s1_o[msk1]"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "id": "forward-cooperation",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# Build signal 2\n",
    "t2_o = np.linspace(8,12,40)\n",
    "s2_o = np.sin(t2_o)\n",
    "\n",
    "msk2 = np.random.randn(t2_o.size) > 0.6\n",
    "\n",
    "t2_s = t2_o[msk2]\n",
    "s2_s = s2_o[msk2]"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "id": "regulated-wrestling",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 432x288 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {
      "needs_background": "light"
     },
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "plt.figure()\n",
    "plt.plot(t1_o,s1_o,'r-', lw=0.5, alpha=0.5, label='sig 1')\n",
    "plt.plot(t1_s,s1_s,'r.', alpha=0.5)\n",
    "plt.plot(t2_o,s2_o,'b-', lw=0.5, alpha=0.5, label='sig 2')\n",
    "plt.plot(t2_s,s2_s,'b.', alpha=0.5)\n",
    "plt.legend()\n",
    "plt.show()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "raising-incentive",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "From this singals we would expect a maximum at 11-5=6, and several max and mins at distances of pi from this."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "id": "recorded-mozambique",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "sig1_o = mutis.Signal(t1_o, s1_o, 'lc_gen_psd')\n",
    "sig2_o = mutis.Signal(t2_o, s2_o, 'lc_gen_psd')\n",
    "corr_o = mutis.Correlation(sig1_o,sig2_o,'welsh_ab')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 7,
   "id": "armed-gravity",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [

     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",

      ]
     },
     "metadata": {
      "needs_background": "light"
     },
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "corr_o.gen_times(dt0=0.1, ndtmax=3, nbinsmin=3)\n",
    "corr_o.plot_times(rug=True)"
   ]
  },

    "vertlines(6,-1,2, pi)\n",
    "fig.show()"
   ]

    "# Build signal 1\n",
    "t1_o = np.linspace(2,6,80)\n",
    "s1_o = np.exp(-0.8*(t1_o-4)**2)\n",
    "\n",
    "msk1 = np.random.randn(t1_o.size) > 0.6\n",
    "\n",
    "t1_s = t1_o[msk1]\n",
    "s1_s = s1_o[msk1]"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 16,
   "id": "gothic-junction",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# Build signal 2\n",
    "t2_o = np.linspace(8,12,80)\n",
    "s2_o = np.exp(-0.8*(t2_o-9)**2)\n",
    "\n",
    "msk2 = np.random.randn(t2_o.size) > 0.5\n",
    "\n",
    "t2_s = t2_o[msk2]\n",
    "s2_s = s2_o[msk2]"
   ]

  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "liable-socket",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## 3. Several pulses, with error"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 27,
   "id": "significant-efficiency",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# Build signal 1\n",
    "t1_o = np.linspace(2,16,35)\n",
    "s1_o = np.exp(-1.8*(t1_o-4)**2) + np.exp(-1.8*(t1_o-12)**2) + 0.01\n",
    "\n",
    "msk1 = np.random.rand(t1_o.size) < 1.5*(s1_o+0.1)\n",
    "\n",
    "t1_s = t1_o[msk1]\n",
    "s1_s = s1_o[msk1]\n",
    "\n",
    "# ... and add error:\n",
    "t1_s = t1_s + 0.01*np.random.randn(t1_s.size)\n",
    "s1_s = s1_s + 0.3*s1_s*np.random.randn(s1_s.size)  + 0.05*np.random.rand(s1_s.size)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 28,
   "id": "diverse-mobility",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# Build signal 2\n",
    "t2_o = np.linspace(7,23,50)\n",
    "s2_o = np.exp(-1.8*(t2_o-12)**2) + np.exp(-1.8*(t2_o-20)**2) + 0.01\n",
    "\n",
    "msk2 = np.random.rand(t2_o.size) < 1.5*(s2_o+0.1)\n",
    "\n",
    "t2_s = t2_o[msk2]\n",
    "s2_s = s2_o[msk2]\n",
    "\n",
    "# ... and add error:\n",
    "t2_s = t2_s + 0.01*np.random.randn(t2_s.size)\n",
    "s2_s = s2_s + 0.3*s2_s*np.random.randn(s2_s.size) + 0.05*np.random.rand(s2_s.size)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 29,
   "id": "weighted-filing",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 432x288 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {
      "needs_background": "light"
     },
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "plt.figure()\n",
    "plt.plot(t1_o,s1_o,'r-', lw=0.5, alpha=0.3, label='sig 1')\n",
    "plt.plot(t1_s,s1_s,'r.', alpha=0.5)\n",
    "plt.plot(t2_o,s2_o,'b-', lw=0.5, alpha=0.3, label='sig 2')\n",
    "plt.plot(t2_s,s2_s,'b.', alpha=0.5)\n",
    "plt.legend()\n",
    "plt.show()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "structural-shade",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "From these signals we would expect a strong maximum at 8 with close minima (and maybe others peaks near 16 and 0)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 30,
   "id": "mineral-placement",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "sig1_o = mutis.Signal(t1_o, s1_o, 'lc_gen_psd')\n",
    "sig2_o = mutis.Signal(t2_o, s2_o, 'lc_gen_psd')\n",
    "corr_o = mutis.Correlation(sig1_o,sig2_o,'welsh_ab')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 31,
   "id": "dying-gabriel",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [

     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",

       "<Figure size 432x288 with 2 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {
      "needs_background": "light"
     },
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "corr_o.gen_times(dt0=0.2, ndtmax=1, nbinsmin=6)\n",
    "corr_o.plot_times(rug=True)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
